summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from July 10, 2019, coordinating the logistics for the execution of a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence scheduled for the following day, July 11, 2019. It shows planning among FBI agents and possibly other government agencies for the operation.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The individual whose residence is the target of the FBI's scheduled search warrant execution on July 11, 2019.

events.title: Epstein Residence Search Execution
events.description: Planned execution of a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence by the FBI and other assisting personnel.

events.title: Search Warrant Planning and Briefing
events.description: FBI coordination email sent to plan the logistics for the next day's search, including a scheduled briefing for agents between 9:30 and 10 am.

locations: C20 area (FBI New York - C20 VCAC/Human Trafficking)
keyFacts: The FBI planned to execute a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence on July 11, 2019.
The search warrant was to be sworn out on the morning of July 11, 2019, immediately prior to execution.
A coordination briefing for assisting agents was scheduled for between 9:30 and 10 am on July 11 in the 'C20 area'.
The email originated from the FBI New York field office's VCAC/Human Trafficking unit, indicating the nature of the investigation.
The communication shows multi-agency coordination, mentioning '(NY) (OGA)' which likely stands for Other Government Agency.
